short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Text To Speech for the visually impaired.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Our chrome extension aids the visually impaired in browsing the web, especially sites with too many ads and clutter that make it difficult for them. As such, this is a Text-To-Speech extension that also behaves as an adblocker. These 2 features go hand in hand to help filter out anything that may become hindersome for the visually impaired.
